gate.event
Interface ProgressListener

All Superinterfaces:
EventListener
All Known Subinterfaces:
Handle
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractController.IntervalProgressListener, AbstractProcessingResource.IntervalProgressListener, JapeViewer, MainFrame, NameBearerHandle, ProgressListenerAdaptor, ProgressPrinter, SearchPRViewer, SerialControllerEditor.InternalProgressListener
public interface ProgressListener
extends EventListener

This interface describes objects that can register themselves as listeners to ProcessProgressReporters. They need to be able to handle progress change and process finished events.

Method Summary
 void processFinished()
          Called when the process is finished.
 void progressChanged(int i)
          Called when the progress has changed
